metadata.businessValue: Our customers have been able to quickly get upto speed on the latest software and hardware techniques to present engagingcontent and scale their in-house development and broadcast capabilities.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Short description
content: Customtraining and implementation support focused on Live Event best practices.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Long description
content: The perfect solution for organizations that want to leverage Microsoft Teams Live Events along with engaging dynamic content and compelling presentations.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content: There are many options and methods fordeveloping and producing Live Events. It is often overwhelming fororganizations to learn how to take advantage of all the tools and technologyavailable to produce high quality content.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content: We provide an easy solution that focuses on acustom approach for each organization that accelerates the adoption andimplementation of Live Event production and streaming to large audiences.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content: We are only successful when our customers are successful.  We help them achieve amazing results by walkingthem through each step of the process from planning and design, layout andflow, to rehearsal and event production.

detailItemCategories.name: Resources
